=== About me (Again) ===

It all started when at the age of 15 I saw my first GNU / Linux distribution, especially Ubuntu. I definitively abandoned windows xp, to approach what would definitively be my favorite operating system. Over the years, I began to experiment, modify, adjust until I acquired the right skills. Although I actually learn something new every day.
